xml:
Oral suspension
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 9 - Space the doses evenly throughout the day. Keep taking this medicine until the course is finished, unless you are told to stop

Excipients

May contain

Sorbitol

Tamiflu 6mg/ml oral suspension <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Roche Products Ltd)</ph> 21525111000001101

Oseltamivir (as Oseltamivir phosphate) 6 mg per 1 ml

  • 65 ml POM

    NHS indicative price = £10.27

OSELTAMIVIR
